detaileddescription.para:
Get the opacity of a pixel based it's position in a line segment
seg
segment length
px_id
position of of a pixel which opacity should be get [0..seg-1]
base_opa
the base opacity
the opacity of the given pixel

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_coord_t x, lv_coord_t y, lv_coord_t length, const lv_area_t *mask, lv_color_t color, lv_opa_t opa)
memberdef.name: lv_draw_aa_ver_seg

detaileddescription.para:
Add a vertical anti-aliasing segment (pixels with decreasing opacity)
x
start point x coordinate
y
start point y coordinate
length
length of segment (negative value to start from 0 opacity)
mask
draw only in this area
color
color of pixels
opa
maximum opacity

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_coord_t x, lv_coord_t y, lv_coord_t length, const lv_area_t *mask, lv_color_t color, lv_opa_t opa)
memberdef.name: lv_draw_aa_hor_seg

detaileddescription.para:
Add a horizontal anti-aliasing segment (pixels with decreasing opacity)
x
start point x coordinate
y
start point y coordinate
length
length of segment (negative value to start from 0 opacity)
mask
draw only in this area
color
color of pixels
opa
maximum opacity
